Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Darton, wasn't this part of the <clr:0000>footprint<clr:ffff>
more like stomp-stomp?
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? What does that even mean?
More stamp-stamp, maybe...
Talk_0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, Mr. Traveler! I'll tell you about
these <clr:0000>footprints<clr:ffff>, but you have to
promise to believe us!
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, Mr. Traveler! Are you interested in
these <clr:0000>footprints<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, Darton! There's a customer!
You have to say "welcome"!
Talk_0026:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Those footprints... Were they like this? No, I'm sure
they were like this...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry. We're supposed to say
"welcome" together, but...

Darton is obsessed with drawing
those <clr:0000>footprints<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? Wide? No, they were definitely
more broaaad...
Talk_0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_01>Stupid rain, washing those footprints away
before we could get a good look.

I wish it didn't rain so much around there.
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to Dueling Peaks Stable!


If you want to use the stable, then go
ahead and talk to Dad... I mean, the man
at the counter!
Talk_0010: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Work_00>Hey, Shibo! Can I give him that thing?
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We found some strange footprints south
of here in Faron!

They were big. No animal I know leaves
tracks like that. They were <clr:0000>footprints no
one's ever seen before<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0300>We went to tell our dad right away, but...
they disappeared in the rain.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>He said we probably just dreamed 'em up.


But we did see them! Really, we did!
Talk_0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hey, Darton, let's try drawing a picture of
that Dondon!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>OK! Ahem-hem. We are presenting you
with one of our finest treasures.
Talk_0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Ummm... It has a big, round body... The
tusks are REALLY long...and its tail is...

Yeah! That's it!
Talk_0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>It's like you took it right out of my
brain, Darton!

Just wait until Dad sees THIS!
Talk_0056:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Huh? Looks like you can't take it. You're
holding too many things, mister.

I thought I'd give you a <clr:0000>swift carrot<clr:ffff>
I bought with Shibo when I went to
Kakariko Village...
Talk to me again when you're able to
carry it!
Talk_0057:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, mister! Did you make some room in
what you're carrying?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Huh? It looks like you're still holding
too many things.

I'll give you a <clr:0000>swift carrot<clr:ffff> when you have
room. So let's talk again once you've
done that!
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey, Darton! That guy is here! You have
to say "welcome"!
Talk_0058:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, mister! You must have made room in
what you're carrying! Then I'll give you
this, like I said!
Talk_0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>We feed this to horses when we want to
<clr:0000>tame<clr:ffff> them.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to Dueling Peaks Stable!


One of the many things we do great here
is keep you dry from the rain!
Talk_0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>We pooled our money and bought it in
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>, which is up the road
right here to the north.
Thanks for telling us about the Dondon!
Talk_0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry. We're supposed to say
"welcome" together, but...

Darton is obsessed with Dondons now.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? Didn't I already say it, mister?


Wait, is it raining? Let's get inside, quick!
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Darton, isn't this part of the Dondon
more like boooom?
Talk_0046: <sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? No, I think it's more like blaaam.
Talk_0005: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? Didn't I already say it, mister?
Talk_0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Shibo, come on! We need to strategize
about the <clr:0000>footprints<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We found strange footprints when we
went to Faron, but...

Nobody believes us.
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Dartonnnnn!


I'm glad you're drawing the <clr:0000>strange
footprints<clr:ffff> so we don't forget, but you
HAVE to say "welcome"!
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseS_01>Darton, did you hear that?! The footprints
we saw were the real deal!
Talk_0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You see the weirdest stuff down south in
Faron, huh?

Wait, Darton, that's not it! Weren't they
more wiiide?
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>A Dondon, huh? And only five have ever
been found in the whole world?!

That's why nobody knew about it!


And Dad said we were dreaming. Ha!
I can't wait to see the look on his face
when we tell him!
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Darton, you can't do that! You have to
say "welcome"!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Wow! Thanks!


Travelers go to so many places and learn
so many thingsâ€”it's just amazing.

That's why I drew the footprints. I hoped
a traveler would see them and teach us
something amazing too.
